Text:
Ok, so, as I mentioned before, I think I stretched myself a little thin with three releases right of the bat, so, I'm temporarily pausing Last Crusade and Raiders of the Lost Arc.
Temple of Doom is my most popular torrent, so I'm putting all my bandwidth towards it, in the hopes that once I get some seeders from there, I can then restart seeding the other two again.  Sorry guys, but I think this will work out being fastest for everyone.
what program do you use for converting movies?

Thanks for the torrents! I got your Temple torrent and the quality was great, well worth the download.

Any chance you can seed this one for a few days to help us all out? Last I checked there were 11 of us stuck at 90.1%. Can't speak for everyone, but I will leave it seeding to help you out if you can manage.

Thanks again!

Hey Rocket,

I've been searching for a torrent of the Rocket Robin Hood series for years. You wouldn't happen to have some or all, would you? 

    The title song rocks!
